summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to an unspecified recipient, discussing a call made to the Southern District of New York. The email indicates a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase, suggesting a connection to legal matters involving Epstein.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, indicating involvement in a communication related to legal matters.

keyFacts: The email was sent on November 12, 2010.
Jes Staley attempted to call the Southern District of New York.
The email requests confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
